data.eml:eml: Morphological and molecular data reveal the cryptic diversity among populations of Aegla paulensis (Decapoda, Anomura, Aeglidae), with descriptions of four new species and comments on dispersal routes and conservation status

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Moraes, Juliana Cristina Bertacini, Terossi, Mariana, Buranelli, Raquel Corrêa, Mantelatto, Fernando L., Bueno, Sérgio Luiz De Siqueira (2016): Morphological and molecular data reveal the cryptic diversity among populations of Aegla paulensis (Decapoda, Anomura, Aeglidae), with descriptions of four new species and comments on dispersal routes and conservation status. Zootaxa 4193 (1): 1-48, DOI: http://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4193.1.1
